document.full_text: president obama nominated gen. martin e. dempsey to be the next chairman of the joint chiefs of staff, rounding out his realignment of the top pentagon and intelligence posts.
document.title: at war: reaction to dempsey appointment
lines_and_colors: president obama nominated gen. martin e. dempsey to be the next chairman of the joint chiefs of staff, rounding out his realignment of the top pentagon and intelligence posts.
